attributes.action: deplore the low sentences given to those convicted of the assault and murder of Peter Bryan and to take decisive action to deter any future acts of violence on innocent people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Peter Bryan was a Grandfather killed by a gang of youths who beat him to death.  Those involved got sentences ranging from  14 months to 11 years.   His family will have to deal with the pain for the rest of their lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
